ai-patthana17.8:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.8:0.3_0: Seeing for the sake of goodness,
ai-patthana17.8:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.8:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.8:2.1_0: unskillful qualities should not be given up by development, nor by development, be given up by developing the bases of the skillful.
ai-patthana17.8:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.8:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.8:3.1_0: not skilled in seeing oral causes and reasons.
ai-patthana17.8:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.8:4.1_0: Not seeing the cause, not to be given up in order to show the reason for the sake of development, nor for the sake of developing and cultivating them.
ai-patthana17.8:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
